title: Is there an IDA disassembler module for IBM 360/370/390?
content:
Has anyone written an IDA disassembler module for
IBM 360/370/390 or higher processors? Would like
to examine one even though i cannot afford IDA Pro.

answers_data.content: Nope. This sounds like archeology work :) Nevertheless, such module could be implemented in a week if you know how to use IDA SDK and the instruction set of IBM 360.
